> What is fucking you up are the over paid foreigners.  Who exactly are you referring to?  Personally, I don't see how "overpaid foreigners" are fucking anyone up. What I do see is increasing income disparity. But the reason why some foreigners are able to command high salaries (compared to local salaries, not necessarily international ones - let's say 80k+) is that they are capable of performing specialized work for which the small local market does not have enough qualified talent. Local companies then have to recruit abroad, sometimes even going through the process of relocating TCNs. Again, not to save money, as recruitment/relocation/visa make the process quite costly, but simply because they just cannot find qualified workers in Malta. Of course these foreigners are able to spend more, but without them, their companies - many of which employ hundreds of Maltese - would simply cease to exist, at least in Malta.
